General.Name: Taihan Precision Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: TaiHan Precision Technology Co,Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and trading of various precision molds, tooling, and plastic molding products worldwide. It operates through Molds and Plastic Molding segments. The company offers plastic injection products; surface treatment products, such as painting, NCVM, and IMD products; and assembly/installation and welding products and services. It also provides MFP related components; keyboard frames, keyboards, and handset key tops; mobility products, including handset housings, net book and DSC housings, and plastic components of digital photo frames; plastic components of photo printers; and projector housing and other plastic components, as well as develops and fabricates molds and dies for automotive plastic components. The company was formerly known as TaiHan Steel Mold Corp. and changed its name to TaiHan Precision Technology Co,Ltd. in June 2000. TaiHan Precision Technology Co,Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 568, Minsheng North Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333
